short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The application is used to create passwords and manage passwords with a variety of preset options

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create Password is a versatile browser extension designed to help you quickly generate strong and secure passwords based on your specific needs and customizations. Whether you need passwords of varying lengths, special characters, uppercase or lowercase letters, Create Password allows you to tailor your passwords to your exact specifications.

The extension offers robust password security and includes a convenient password storage list for easy management. Additionally, Create Password integrates various encryption methods to further enhance your security, ensuring that your passwords remain protected across all browsers.
